珓字的基本解释

珓
jiào
〔杯珓〕占卜的用具，多用两个蚌壳或像蚌壳的竹、木片做成，掷在地上，看它的俯仰，以此占卜吉凶，如“手持珓珓导我掷，云此最吉馀难同。”

珓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiào］
［《廣韻》古孝切，去效，見。］
杯珓。占卜之具。用蚌壳或形似蚌壳的竹木两片，投空掷于地，视其俯仰，以定吉凶。

珓字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　珓； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页730第11
【廣韻】古孝切，音敎。杯珓，古者以玉爲之。【類篇】巫以占吉凶者。【演繁露】杯珓，用兩蚌㱿，或用竹根。　又或作敎。【荆楚歲時記】秋社擬敎於神。【註】敎，言敎，令也。　又或作筊。【石林燕語】高辛廟有竹桮筊，以一俯一仰爲聖筊。

珓字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
珓字的起名意思

占卜的用具，如杯珓。

divination
Basic explanation of words
divination
jiào
[Cup 珓] Divination tools are mostly made of two clam shells or clam shell-like bamboo or wood chips. They are thrown on the ground and watched as they rise to divination. Good luck and hardships are the same."
divination
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiào］
["Guangyun" Gu Xiaoqie, go to effect, see. ]
Cup 珓. Divination tools. Use a clam shell or two pieces of bamboo and wood shaped like a clam shell, throw them in the air, and watch them pitch to determine good or bad.
divination
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　珓; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 730 No. 11
[Guangyun] Gu Xiaoqie, sound tea. Cup 珓, the ancients used jade for it. 【Classes】Witches take good and bad luck. 【Play Fanlu】Cup 珓, use two clams, or use bamboo roots.　Or make a mess. [Jing Chu Sui Shi Ji] The Autumn Society is intended to be taught to God. 【Note】Education, speech, order.　Or make a 筊. [Stone Forest Yanyu] There are bamboo cups in the Gaoxin Temple, with one bow and one rising as the holy one.
divination
